title: Goading Attack
content:
Goading Attack Effect Deal an additional 1d8 and attempt to goad the target into attacking you. Target receives Disadvantage on attacking any other creature. Requirements Lvl 3 Battle Master (Fighter Subclass)Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.
